content: The green box on top of messages that says, for example, "2 files added to context". When hovering over that text, display a popup with the file paths of those files. Other than that don't change anything.
The popup box is blank. Do you need to send those file paths from the server?
Good. Only show the popup when hovering over the text itself, not the entire green box.
Put the green line above the LLM name instead of below it.
